Package game.reset

Class ResetManager

java.lang.Object
game.reset.ResetManager
public class ResetManager
extends java.lang.Object
A reset manager class that manages a list of resettables and handles the game reset Created by: Adrian Kristanto Last Modified By: William Bata-Kindermann
See Also:
Resettable
